titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: Swarthmore College, Friends Historical Library Swarthmore, Pennsylvania 19081-1399 U.S.A.

bioghist.p: Lawrence L. Landry was Swarthmore College's Vice President of Finance from 1979 to 1982. He was a member of the Committee on Facilities Planning and Management of the National Association of College and University Business Officers. Prior to coming to Swarthmore he was Vice President and Treasurer of Clark University. The Vice President of Finance is responsible for the College's budget, financial planning, endowment management, and stewardship of financial resources.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of files from the office of Vice President of Finance Lawrence Landry. Materials include: financial statement of investment funds; articles and papers on finance by Landry and others; materials related to a course on economics and investment that he taught at Swarthmore in 1982; expense reports; records of the Arthur Hoyt Scott Horticultural Foundation, including financial statements, correspondence, reports, and minutes; documentation of the Committee on Computer Services, including minutes, specifications for equipment and facilities for a computing center, and proposals for courses in computing instruction; and correspondence and reports on renovations to campus buildings.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
